reference-code.description: The student did not apply for free or reduced price meals.
The student applied for free or reduced price meals but is not eligible.
The student is eligible for reduced-price meals.
The student is enrolled in a USDA-approved Provision 2 school.
The student is eligible for free meals based on direct certification, but declines.
The student is eligible for free meals based on direct certification, automatic approval.
The student is enrolled in a USDA.
The student is eligible for free meals based upon the Direct Certification determination.
The student is eligible for reduced price meals based upon the Direct Certification determination.
The student is eligible for free meals.
The student is enrolled in a USDA and NOT identified as eligible for free meals.
The student is enrolled in a USDA and identified as eligible for reduced price meals.
